hero.text: Join Sukon and start your journey in providing psychological support!

step1.description: Information you need to know before registering

psychologist.title: Clinical Psychologist
psychologist.req1: Master's degree in psychology or clinical psychology
psychologist.req2: Two years of experience in clinical psychology

counselor.title: Psychological Counselor
counselor.req1: Master's degree in psychology or counseling psychology
counselor.req2: Five years of experience in psychological counseling

loginForm.title: Welcome Back!
loginForm.description: Please enter your details to complete the login process
loginForm.hero: A comprehensive dashboard to manage your tasks with ease!

verifyForm.title: Email Verification
verifyForm.description: Enter the verification code sent to your email

hero.title: Welcome to Sukon — Innovative Mental Health Solutions

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Integrated tools to help you provide better care, in less time and with less effort!

cards.title: Patient File & Reports
cards.description: A central system to record all patient data (diagnosis, treatment, sessions, medications) with the ability to extract detailed reports.

cards.title: Appointments & Sessions Management
cards.description: A comprehensive system to track patient progress, manage session appointments, and send reminders for medications and sessions.

cards.title: Therapeutic Motivation System
cards.description: Tracks patient adherence to medications and therapeutic tasks via the Streak system, with motivational rewards to enhance persistence and progress.

cards.title: AI Assistant for Diagnosis & Analysis
cards.description: AI suggests initial plans and treatment based on diagnostic data and doctor guidance, with risk flags and instant specialist alerts.

cards.title: Permissions System
cards.description: A flexible system for managing permissions among doctors, specialists, and the admin team, with patient data protection.

cards.title: Comprehensive Psychological Tests
cards.description: A list of the most popular psychological tests (like MMPI) with the ability to track results over time and use them in patient follow-up.

afterServicesHero.prompt: Do you want to manage your clinic more efficiently and comfortably?
afterServicesHero.headline: Track your appointments, analyze your patients' data, and communicate with them securely—all powered by AI!
afterServicesHero.subheadline: Start with Sukon... for smart and easy clinic management!

items.name: Dr. Omar Kamal
items.text: Managing appointments and sessions has become much easier, and the effective reminders help me never miss an appointment. Also, the AI feature for analyzing patient progress is great and saves me a lot of time preparing reports.

items.name: Dr. Sarah Ahmed
items.text: The platform is user-friendly and the support team is always responsive. The integration of AI in patient management is a game changer for my clinic.

whyUs.title: Why should you choose our services?
whyUs.description: We provide you with a smart and simple system to manage your clinic, save your time, and improve your patients' experience, while ensuring the efficiency and security of their data.

features.title: Expertise
features.desc: Our smart system makes clinic management easier and more efficient, helping you focus on patient care.

features.title: Commitment
features.desc: We are committed to supporting you with the latest technologies that simplify your work and ensure the best treatment experience.

features.title: Benefits
features.desc: Everything you need in one place! Tools for appointment management, patient follow-up, and accurate data analysis.

features.title: Communication
features.desc: Enhance your communication with patients through a secure system for easy follow-up and effective interaction.

contact.prompt: Do you want to ask about something?
contact.heading: We care about your inquiry and opinion!
contact.doctorsNote: Many doctors and support are ready to respond instantly!

footer.description:
With Sukon

Track your appointments, analyze your patients' data, and communicate securely—all powered by AI.
